mapper.select: SELECT num, bln, ename, eid, email, tel, addr, addr_detail FROM( SELECT rownum rnum, num, bln, ename, eid, email, tel, addr, addr_detail FROM( SELECT rownum num, bln, ename, eid, email, tel, addr, addr_detail FROM emp WHERE bln=#{bln} ORDER BY num desc) ORDER BY rnum desc) WHERE rnum between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(*) from emp where bln=#{bln}

SELECT num, pid, pname, pet_name, tel, to_char(bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as bdate , bln, cl_status, cl_seq FROM( SELECT rownum rnum,num, pid, pname, pet_name, tel, bdate, bln, cl_status, cl_seq FROM( SELECT rownum num, bll.pid, pro.pname, bk.pet_name, pro.tel, bk.bdate, bll.bln, cl.cl_status,bll.cl_seq FROM protector pro, bl_list bll, book_list bk,admin ad, claim cl WHERE pro.pid = bll.pid and pro.pid = bk.pid and ad.aid = bll.aid and cl.cl_seq = bll.cl_seq and bll.bln=#{bln} ORDER BY num desc) ORDER BY rnum desc) WHERE rnum between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(*) from bl_list where bln=#{bln}

SELECT pid, pname, pet_name, tel, to_char(wdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as wdate, cl_text, msg, cl_seq, bln FROM( SELECT pro.pid, pro.pname, bk.pet_name, pro.tel, cl.wdate, cl.cl_text, cl.msg, bll.cl_seq, bll.bln FROM protector pro, bl_list bll, book_list bk, claim cl WHERE pro.pid=bll.pid and pro.pid=bk.pid and cl.cl_seq = bll.cl_seq and bll.bln=#{bln} ) WHERE cl_seq=#{cl_seq}

SELECT cln_name, bln, director, tel, email, open_time, close_time, night_yn, post, sido, sigungu, emd, addr_detail, cut_yn, hstl_yn, intro, nopen, nclose FROM( SELECT cl.cln_name, cl.bln, cl.director, cl.tel, cl.email, cl.open_time, cl.close_time, cl.night_yn, cl.post, cl.sido, cl.sigungu, cl.emd, cl.addr_detail, cl.cut_yn, cl.hstl_yn, cl.intro, nc.nopen, nc.nclose FROM clinic cl, night_care nc WHERE cl.bln = nc.bln) WHERE bln=#{bln}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE reciever = '2' or reciever = '0'
